name: Pulley
headline: Pulley helps startups manage their equity and cap table
description:
Pulley is the cap table and equity management platform that helps founders and employees make smarter decisions about their equity.

For early stage companies, Pulley helps founders get started on hiring and fundraising, avoid expensive equity mistakes, and save thousands on legal fees. With Pulley, you can compare different funding scenarios, raise capital, and set up equity grants for employees.

Our tools help companies answer important questions such as:
1. How much of the company will I own after my next round?
2. How will pro-rata rights impact my ownership in future rounds?
3. How do I explain the value of equity to candidates?

Equity is a company's single most important asset. Pulley gives companies insights into their equity, so they can make smarter decisions around hiring and fundraising, while proactively staying ahead of tax filings and accounting. If you are looking for a way to manage your cap table, try Pulley at https://pulley.com/.

founders.name: Yin Wu, Founder
founders.description: Yin Wu is a serial entrepreneur who sold her last previous company to Microsoft in 2015. She was one of the youngest principal engineers at Microsoft and built products that applied machine learning to mobile products. Prior to Microsoft, Yin studied computer science at Stanford. She dropped out in 2011 to join Y Combinator for her first startup and is a three time Y Combinator alumnus (S11, S13, W20).

# Everything you need to manage equity
Pulley helps thousands of companies issue and track their equity. Get 409A valuations, cap table management, and equity advice all in one system.
[Get Started](https://pulley.com/</demo>)
![Everything you need to manage equity](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6075d9b97f07e4c3a1a21e7a/648adade4b7fc1b0d941a381_cap%20table%20home%20hero%20new2.svg)

## Fundraising
Build confidence with investors and manage the entire fundraising process on Pulley: model your round -> issue SAFEs -> collect wires.
[Eliminate errors with one process](https://pulley.com/</products/fundraising-modeling>)
![Fundraising](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6075d9b97f07e4c3a1a21e7a/646d0611f5944ee2b1149b5c_Fundraising-new2%20\(1\).png)
![409As & Compliance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6075d9b97f07e4c3a1a21e7a/646d065fd74a0553bdcb419a_409As-new2.png)
audit-ready
## 409As & Compliance
Get a 409A valuation in five days or less.‍Put your equity compliance on autopilot. Handle 83b elections, form 3921, and stock-based comp reports.
[Learn more](https://pulley.com/</products/409a>)
GLOBAL
## Equity Issuance
Pulley supports equity grants for US and international employees. Create a culture of ownership for your whole team.
[Preview the employee experience](https://pulley.com/</products/employee-experience>)
![Equity Issuance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6075d9b97f07e4c3a1a21e7a/646d0688359ae224a054a701_Global%20Equity%20Issuance-new2%20\(1\).png)

Chat with one of our experts to answer your questions around dilution, fundraising, employee equity and more.
[Book your session now](https://pulley.com/</demo>)

![How equity matters for returns & control](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6075d9b97f07e4c3a1a21e7a/6477ba9e3cd53160ced598fe_how%20equity%20matters.png)

[View](https://pulley.com/</guides/what-is-a-409a-valuation>)
## We’re winning the next generation of founders
Equity is the most valuable asset your company owns. Pulley is building the platform to help founders and employees make better decisions around your equity. There’s a reason why scaling startups choose Pulley (preferred by most of the YC batch).
![G2 badges spring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6075d9b97f07e4c3a1a21e7a/648add64c77554d6595b3d81_g2%20badges%20spring%20\(1\).png)

Join 5000+ companies managing their equity with Pulley

generated_description:
**Pulley: Managing Equity Smarter for Startups**

Pulley is a dynamic startup founded in 2020, nestled in the bustling innovation hub of San Francisco. As part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2020 batch, Pulley has quickly made a name for itself as an invaluable tool for founders and employees dealing with equity and cap table management.

**What They Do:**
The core mission of Pulley is straightforward: they help startups navigate the sometimes murky waters of equity management. For early-stage companies, this means a treasure trove of benefits. From hiring to fundraising, Pulley aims to eliminate costly equity blunders and streamline legal processes, saving startups significant time and money.

**Key Functions:**
- **Cap Table Management:** Get clear insights into ownership structures, allowing founders to grasp exactly how much equity they’ll have after future funding rounds.
- **Fundraising Modeling:** Compare scenarios, prepare for rounds, and efficiently issue SAFEs (Simple Agreements for Future Equity).
- **Compliance Made Easy:** Obtain 409A valuations swiftly, facilitating smoother tax handling and compliance.
- **Employee Engagement:** Educate and inform employees about equity, building a culture of ownership and motivation.

Pulley’s tools address essential questions such as:
- What portion of the company will I own post-funding?
- How do my pro-rata rights work?
- How do I communicate the true value of equity to potential hires?

**Why Pulley?**
Equity is arguably one of the most vital assets a company holds, and Pulley enables founders to take the reins. The platform consolidates critical functions, offering a single place to manage equity, ensuring you're ahead of tax filings and accounting—two areas that can otherwise drown you in administrative intricacies.

**The Team:**
Currently, Pulley employs approximately 68 people and is guided by Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner. This compact but efficient team is dedicated to evolving their platform to better serve the needs of modern companies.

**Join the Movement:**
With over 5,000 companies already utilizing Pulley, it’s clear that this tool is resonating within the startup community. If you’re a founder seeking a seamless way to manage your equity and propel your company forward, give Pulley a shot. You might just simplify your journey.

For more insights and to start your free trial, visit [Pulley’s website](https://pulley.com/).
